title: As a Designer
content: I mostly enjoy to design the web template, Apps and brochures. To design those i use Adobe XD, Figma.

title: Front-End Development
content: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser. Languages i speak with HTML, Pug, Slim, CSS, Sass, Less

title: Back-end Development
content: Creating logics, and adding new featured to develope is most passionate work for me. The logics i think with PYTHON, PHP, Nodejs

title: Digital Margeting
content: After develop most challenging point to bring target traffic & rank on search engine. Covered Keyword Research, On-Page SEO, analytics.
